content: lion brand pattern # 40446 *chs-babypocketcardiganandhat pdf* published in crochet magazine simply creative crochet skill level easy level 2 size 3-6 mos 12 mos 18 mos finished chest 23½ 26½ 28¾ inches 59 5 67 5 73 cm length 11 13 14 inches 28 33 35 5 cm hat circumference 14 16 17 inches 35 5 40 5 43 cm mc homespun® baby article #800 279 yards *discontinued* *#790 lion brand homespun can be substituted * plus a babysoft® article #920 1 ball for patches and pockets plus b magic stripes article #310 330 yards for hat *magic stripes has been discontinued sportweight or sock weight yarn may be substituted * crochet hook - size k-10 5 6 5 mm crochet hook - size g-6 4 mm crochet hook - size e-4 3 5 mm four 7/8 inches 22 mm buttons pieces left front right front back sleeves 2 elbow patches 2 hat features a tassel work blanket stitch in contrast color a with blunt needle to finish cardigan edges construction schematics are provided *ed note pattern can be adapted for boys or girls reverse buttons/buttonholes * *lion brand patterns are written in u s crochet terminology * *free registration at site required to access patterns *
